channel.title: Item wonted!
channel.description:
Hey i wont a scarf... but i can't get for my server so is there a way of gettin a scarf??
Please tell me i really wont scarf :)
plus tell me were to put it :D
Thanks

item.title: Item wonted!
item.dc:creator: @baez9 baez9
item.description:
@baez9 wrote:

You gotta find the model in datmaker, convert it to MQO and switch it to metseq for editting or if u just want it how it is just make the drop model and the model save it, make it a zip file (forgot name) and make a it the number u want it to be to be able to spawn it then put it in models folder add the ints in class8.java and go ingame say add model (model number) add model (drop model number) and restart the client and u should be set.

Read full topic

item.title: Item wonted!
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

you need a model for the scarf, add it to your client.(class8) then you comile the client and start server up and if you did it right you should have a scarf. dont ask me to get you the model as its to much work on my part just for your benefit. Just ask. Is a scarf really worth it.

Read full topic
